name: Goaher The Cougar
description:
Story: Goaher Was Sleeping At Home When A Robot Broke Through And Stole His Saphire to sell online and be rich. can goaher get it back?

if your game does not work, turn off the screensaver

i thought and don't want people to have to wait long for goaher so i'm gonna have it come out in 3 weeks.
